g:HTMLPanel.h2: This is Raphy charts for Raphael4gwt Test examples.
g:HTMLPanel.p: Inside project raphael4gwt there is a sub project, with a separate GWT module, for doing Raphy charts in GWT (using the library raphael4gwt).
Raphy charts uses raphael internally for drawing the charts, but do not expose any Raphael API to the user. The user works with HTML Elements only, not with raphael's paper or shapes.
